commenter_a: R.I.P. D'Marco you fought a good fight
post_message: D'Marco Jackson passed away this morning. You may remember D'Marco from an inspirational speech he delivered last year at the Hermitage High School graduation.  “If I had to pick a singular piece of advice to give you all, I’d say this … do not let the realities of the past or the possibilities of the future negatively affect the peace, joy and happiness that the present has to offer,” he said.  Read more: @webpagelink
